name: Terminator Genisys
description: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

review.author: Marshall-D-Teach
review.heading: Genisys
review.reviewBody: Not quite as bad as i thought it would be, Terminator: Genisys brings back the nostalgia of the first two films. It even has the same old-school vibe to it. But when you get to its core, Genisys is simply a rehash of the first two masterpieces, which are so good there was no point in revisiting them.

keywords: cyborg,future,time machine,human versus cyborg,human versus robot
